cast.overview: In the aftermath of an unspeakable act of terror, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the Boston Marathon bombers before they strike again.
cast.title: Patriots Day

details.biography: Elijah Guo is a stage, film and television actor, writer and musician. He holds BAs in both Theater & Performance Studies and English from the University of California, Berkeley, and an MFA in Acting from the American Repertory Theater/Moscow Art Theater Institute at Harvard University, Cambridge, Massachusetts.
details.name: Elijah Guo
